articles.title: EU plans new sanctions after Putin's nuclear escalation threat - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Calls grow for immediate sanctions and more weapons for Kyiv as West reacts to Putin’s escalation in Ukraine.
articles.content:
Europe is drawing up plans to hit Russia with fresh sanctions amid demands for a swift response, after Vladimir Putin threatened to use nuclear weapons in his war against Ukraine.

articles.author: MUMTAJ BEGUM
articles.title: Gillian Chung was detained at airport in Germany because she's too pretty - The Star Online
articles.description: Apparently, the authority thought the singer-actress was entering Europe to do “illegal things”.
articles.content:
It seems being too pretty is a crime after all.
Hong Kong star Gillian Chung revealed recently that she was once detained at an airport in Germany, and the reason given was that she was young and pr… [+919 chars]
